description: Explore License-Token, a groundbreaking approach to open-source software licensing using blockchain and smart contracts for secure and automated management. Discover how this solution addresses the complexities, challenges, and opportunities in the current licensing landscape.
keywords: License-Token, open-source licensing, blockchain, smart contracts, software compliance, tokenization, open-source monetization, decentralized trust, technology integration
title: License-Token: Innovative Licensing for Open Source
